description: Provides an ApsaraDB Redis / Memcache instance resource. A DB instance is an isolated database environment in the cloud. It can be associated with IP whitelists and backup configuration which are separate resource providers.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AutoRenew.description: Whether to renewal a DB instance automatically or not. It is valid when instance_charge_type is `PrePaid`. Default to `false`.

AutoRenewPeriod.description: Auto-renewal period of an instance, in the unit of the month. It is valid when instance_charge_type is `PrePaid`. Valid value:[1~12], Default to 1.

AvailabilityZone.description: The Zone to launch the DB instance.

BackupId.description: If an instance created based on a backup set generated by another instance is valid, this parameter indicates the ID of the generated backup set.

EngineVersion.description: Engine version. Supported values: 2.8, 4.0 and 5.0. Default value: 2.8. Only 2.8 can be supported for Memcache Instance.

InstanceClass.description:
Type of the applied ApsaraDB for Redis instance. It can be retrieved by data source [`alicloud_kvstore_instance_classes`](https://www.terraform.io/docs/providers/alicloud/d/kvstore_instance_classes.html)
or referring to help-docs [Instance type table](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/26350.htm).

InstanceName.description: The name of DB instance. It a string of 2 to 256 characters.

InstanceType.description: The engine to use: `Redis` or `Memcache`. Defaults to `Redis`.

KmsEncryptedPassword.description: An KMS encrypts password used to a instance. If the `password` is filled in, this field will be ignored.

KmsEncryptionContext.description: An KMS encryption context used to decrypt `kms_encrypted_password` before creating or updating instance with `kms_encrypted_password`. See [Encryption Context](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/42975.htm). It is valid when `kms_encrypted_password` is set.

MaintainEndTime.description: The end time of the operation and maintenance time period of the instance, in the format of HH:mmZ (UTC time).

MaintainStartTime.description: The start time of the operation and maintenance time period of the instance, in the format of HH:mmZ (UTC time).

Password.description: The password of the DB instance. The password is a string of 8 to 30 characters and must contain uppercase letters, lowercase letters, and numbers.

Period.description: The duration that you will buy DB instance (in month). It is valid when instance_charge_type is `PrePaid`. Valid values: [1~9], 12, 24, 36. Default to 1.

SecurityIps.description: Set the instance's IP whitelist of the default security group.

Tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

VpcAuthMode.description: Only meaningful if instance_type is `Redis` and network type is VPC. Valid values are `Close`, `Open`. Defaults to `Open`.  `Close` means the redis instance can be accessed without authentication. `Open` means authentication is required.
